content: knitted hat for men in drops karisma the piece is worked in the round with nordic pattern see winters night enchantment jacket pattern here 1 pattern no u-914 yarn group b **sizes** s/m - m/l fits head size approx 57/59 59/60 cm **materials** drops karisma from garnstudio 100-150 g colour 53 anthracite 50-50 g colour 01 off white **knitting gauge** 22 stitches in width and 30 row in height with stocking stitch and nordic pattern = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm for stocking stitch/nordic pattern drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm for rib 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/219-13-winters-night-enchantment-jacket
